column5: NEW YORK  June 13 The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday said federal judges should have more discretion to boost penalties in patent infringement cases and ordered a lower appeals court to review whether Zimmer Biomet Holdings Inc  willfully violated Stryker Corp patents on a surgical cleaning wand.
